src:
Hasil Pertandingan Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang: Skor 2-1
06 Nov 2019, 20:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persib Bandung berhasil menang 2-1 atas PSIS Semarang di laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019 di Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Soreang, Rabu (o6/11/2019).
Pertandingan yang disiarkan langsung oleh Indosiar ini berlangsung dengan ketat. Kedua tim bermain terbuka dan menghasilkan sejumlah peluang.
Gol dari Persib Bandung dicetak oleh Ezechiel N'Douassel dan Febri Hariyadi. Sementara itu gol semata wayang PSIS Semarang dihasilkan Bruno Silva.

Babak Pertama

Persib langsung tampil menyerang begitu laga dimulai. Hasilnya, Maung Bandung membuka keunggulan di menit ke-10 melalui Ezechiel N'Douassel.
Gol ini berawal dari umpan terobosan Ardi Idrus di sisi kiri pertahanan PSIS. Ezechiel yang mengecoh bek PSIS dengan mudah menaklukkan kiper Joko Ribowo meski dari sudut sempit.
Unggul 1-0, Persib semakin gencar melancarkan serangan. Peluang mencetak gol kembali didapat Ezechiel. Sayang, penyerang asal Chad itu tidak bisa memaksimalkannya.
Pertama, Ezechiel terlambat menendang di kotak penalti sehingga bola bisa direbut bek PSSI. Kedua, sundulannya menyambut umpan Abdul Aziz masih tipis meluncur di sisi kiri gawang PSIS.
Persib mencetak gol kedua di menit ke-37 melalui sudulan Nick Kuipers usai menyambut sepak pojok Febri Hariyadi. Tapi, gol itu dianulir wasit karena sudah terjadi pelanggaran sebelum Kuipers menanduk bola.
Semenit kemudian, gawang Persib nyaris kebobolan oleh sundulan Supardi Nasir. Tapi, kiper Made Wirawan dengan gemilang menepis bola sundulan kapten Persib itu sehingga tidak terjadi gol bunuh diri.
Empat menit jelang laga pertama usai, Persib nyaris mencetak gol kedua. Sayang, sundulan Kuipers menyambut umpan silang Omid Nazardi masih melayang tipis di atas gawang PSIS.
Laga babak pertama pun berakhir. Persib Bandung berada dalam posisi unggul 1-0 atas PSIS Semarang.
text:
Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang Results: Score 2-1
Nov 6 2019, 20:36 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persib Bandung won 2-1 over PSIS Semarang in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 match 2019 at the Si Jalak Harupat Stadium, Soreang, Wednesday (6/6/2011).
The match which was broadcast live by Indosiar took place strictly. Both teams play openly and produce a number of opportunities.
Goals from Persib Bandung were scored by Ezechiel N'Douassel and Febri Hariyadi. Meanwhile PSO Semarang's only puppet goal was produced by Bruno Silva.

First round

Persib immediately appeared to attack when the game began. The result, Maung Bandung opened the scoring in the 10th minute through Ezechiel N'Douassel.
This goal began with a breakthrough bait Ardi Idrus on the left side of the PSIS defense. Ezechiel who fooled PSIS defender easily beat goalkeeper Joko Ribowo even from a narrow angle.
Excellent 1-0, Persib increasingly aggressively launching attacks. Ezechiel got another chance to score again. Unfortunately, the Chadian striker could not maximize it.
First, Ezechiel was late for kicking in the penalty box so the ball could be won by the PSSI defender. Second, his header welcomed bait Abdul Aziz still thin glide on the left side of the PSIS goal.
Persib scored the second goal in the 37th minute through a header from Nick Kuipers after welcoming Febri Hariyadi's corner. But, the referee disallowed the goal because a violation had occurred before Kuipers gore the ball.
A minute later, goalkeeper Persib almost conceded by a header from Supardi Nasir. But, goalkeeper Made Wirawan brilliantly dismissed the Persib captain's header ball so there was no own goal.
Four minutes before the first fight was over, Persib almost scored the second goal. Unfortunately, Kuipers's header welcomed Omid Nazardi's cross still hovering thinly above the PSIS goal.
The first round match ended. Persib Bandung is in a 1-0 lead over PSIS Semarang.
